name: The Working Onion
description:
A short but sweet game I made as a commission for https://foldedzine.com/ , an online zine based in Cumbria, UK.

The theme of the zine issue is identity, and I wanted to use working from home and the weirdness of office politics in a light-hearted way. And what better way to make it light-hearted than through vegetable characters! 

I started learning how to make games during lockdown. I'd been playing text adventure games and games I've played on itch and decided to make my own using Twine.   

I was undoubtedly inspired by Space Frog - https://npckc.itch.io/space-frog - when making The Working Onion. Play it to brighten your day!
